name: Runaway, Princess!!
description:
Princess is being chased by a horrible ghost!

Run away from countless ghosts! 

Fortunately, there are many power-ups that can help her. She can also stop time in an emergency!

The longer you hold out, and the more ghosts you kill, the higher your score will be.

After getting a high score, sign up for Leatherboard to check your level!

This is my first work after I learned Unity. 

Although it's not a perfect game, I hope you enjoy it. :)

* Tutorial * 

1. Survive as long as you can from your enemies!

2. Time in this game only flows when you move.  Don't rush!

3. As time goes by, Power-Ups are created to help you.

4. Likewise, as time goes by, there will be more enemies chasing you! Eliminate enemies effectively using power-up!

5. WASD(or Arrow Keys): Player Movement, SPACE : Time Stop Skill
